label: 大介
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Literally great vice-governor." However, the title appears only in documents sent from the capital to an absentee provincial headquarters (rusudokoro). Most scholars assume, therefore, that ōsuke referred to the governor, who was simply not present. A much debated term.　[留守所]　"
